Producer: Jamie Patricof, Alan Polsky, Gabe Polsky
Production Co: Polsky Films, Sundial Pictures, Hunting Lane Films
Rating: R (Some Violence|Drug and Alcohol Use|A Sexual Assault|All Involving Teens|Pervasive Language|Sexuality/Nudity)
Synopsis: A restless teen (Juno Temple) convinces her best friend (Kay Panabaker) to help her steal a vehicle and head to Los Angeles, where she hopes to find the skateboarder (Kyle Gallner) with whom she experienced her first kiss.
Title: Little Birds
